mapper.select: select p10_project.*,p10_institution.ins_name,p10_outles.outles_name from p10_project left join p10_institution on p10_institution.ins_id = p10_project.ins_id left join p10_outles on p10_outles.outles_id = p10_project.outles_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.project_id = #{projectId} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM p10_project LEFT JOIN p10_project_subject_re ON p10_project_subject_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id where p10_project_subject_re.subject_id = #{subjectId}

select p10_project.* from p10_project left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.status = 1000 and p10_project_casee_re.project_id is null
and p10_project.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and p10_project.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and p10_project.subject_persons like concat('%', #{query.subjectPersons}, '%')
and p10_project.user_nick_name like concat('%', #{query.userNickName}, '%')
and p10_project.company_code like concat('%', #{query.companyCode}, '%')
AND p10_project.take_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select DISTINCT p10_subject.*,p10_project.project_id from p10_project left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_project_casee_re.casee_id left join p10_casee_subject_re on p10_casee_subject_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_subject on p10_subject.subject_id = p10_casee_subject_re.subject_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_id = #{projectId}
and p10_casee_subject_re.casee_personnel_type = #{caseePersonnelType}

select * from (
select 1 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_behavior.behavior_id as businessId,p10_behavior.executed_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.limitEndTime"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.limitEndTime"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_behavior left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_behavior.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_behavior.casee_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_behavior.behavior_status = 1 and p10_behavior.type = 100 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.limitEndTime"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "jldq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.limitEndTime"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 2 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_behavior.behavior_id as businessId,p10_behavior.executed_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.behaviorIllegalCommittingAnIllegalAct.detentionEndDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.behaviorIllegalCommittingAnIllegalAct.detentionEndDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_behavior left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_behavior.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_behavior.casee_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_behavior.behavior_status = 1 and p10_behavior.type = 200 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.behaviorIllegalCommittingAnIllegalAct.detentionEndDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "xwxzdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_behavior.behavior_detail, "$.behaviorIllegalCommittingAnIllegalAct.detentionEndDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION select 3 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,null as casee_id,null as casee_number,null as businessId,null as executedName,p10_project.endTime as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),p10_project.endTime) as remainingDays from ( select p10_project.*,DATE_ADD(p10_project.startDate ,INTERVAL (select deadline_num from p10_deadline_configure where del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "sssxdq" limit 1) year) endTime from ( select p10_project.*,if(p10_payment_record.payment_date is null,p10_project.startingTime,if(p10_project.startingTime>=p10_payment_record.payment_date,p10_project.startingTime,p10_payment_record.payment_date)) startDate from( select p10_project.*,DATE_FORMAT(if(p10_project_urge.urge_time is null,substring(json_extract( p10_transfer_record.transfer_detail, '$.startingTime' ),2,10),p10_project_urge.urge_time), '%Y-%m-%d') startingTime from p10_project left join p10_transfer_record on p10_transfer_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.casee_type in (2020,2021,3031,3031) left join (select project_id,max(urge_time) urge_time from p10_project_urge where del_flag = 0 and urge_according = 100 GROUP BY project_id )p10_project_urge on p10_project_urge.project_id = p10_project.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_id is null and json_extract( p10_transfer_record.transfer_detail, '$.litigation' )=0 ) p10_project left join (select project_id,DATE_FORMAT(max(payment_date), '%Y-%m-%d') payment_date from p10_payment_record where del_flag = 0 and payment_type != 200 GROUP BY project_id limit 1) p10_payment_record on p10_payment_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id )p10_project )p10_project where DATE_SUB(p10_project.endTime, INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "sssxdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and p10_project.endTime >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 4 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,null as casee_id,null as casee_number,null as businessId,null as executedName,p10_project.endTime as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),p10_project.endTime) as remainingDays from ( select p10_project.*,DATE_ADD(p10_project.startDate ,INTERVAL (select deadline_num from p10_deadline_configure where del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "sssxdq" limit 1) year) endTime from ( select p10_project.*,if(p10_payment_record.payment_date is null,p10_project.startingTime,if(p10_project.startingTime>=p10_payment_record.payment_date,p10_project.startingTime,p10_payment_record.payment_date)) startDate from( select p10_project.*,DATE_FORMAT(if(p10_project_urge.urge_time is null,substring(json_extract( p10_transfer_record.transfer_detail, '$.startingTime' ),2,10),p10_project_urge.urge_time), '%Y-%m-%d') startingTime from p10_project left join p10_transfer_record on p10_transfer_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.casee_type in (3031,3031) left join (select project_id,max(urge_time) urge_time from p10_project_urge where del_flag = 0 and urge_according = 200 GROUP BY project_id )p10_project_urge on p10_project_urge.project_id = p10_project.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_id is null and json_extract( p10_transfer_record.transfer_detail, '$.litigation' )=1 ) p10_project left join (select project_id,DATE_FORMAT(max(payment_date), '%Y-%m-%d') payment_date from p10_payment_record where del_flag = 0 and payment_type != 200 GROUP BY project_id limit 1) p10_payment_record on p10_payment_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id )p10_project )p10_project where DATE_SUB(p10_project.endTime, INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "zxsxdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and p10_project.endTime >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 5 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,null as businessId,p10_casee.executed_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.finalReceiptTime"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.finalReceiptTime"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_type = 2020 and p10_casee.`status` = 1 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.finalReceiptTime"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "ssqjs" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.finalReceiptTime"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 6 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_reconciliatio_mediation.reconciliatio_mediation_id as businessId,p10_fulfillment_records.subject_name as executedName,DATE_FORMAT(p10_fulfillment_records.fulfillment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(p10_fulfillment_records.fulfillment_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) as remainingDays from p10_reconciliatio_mediation left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_reconciliatio_mediation.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_reconciliatio_mediation.casee_id left join p10_fulfillment_records on p10_fulfillment_records.reconciliatio_mediation_id = p10_reconciliatio_mediation.reconciliatio_mediation_id where p10_reconciliatio_mediation.del_flag = 0 and p10_reconciliatio_mediation.`status` = 0 and p10_fulfillment_records.`status` = 0 and DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(p10_fulfillment_records.fulfillment_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "lxdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(p10_fulfillment_records.fulfillment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 7 as reminderType,null as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,null as businessId,p10_casee.executed_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.effectiveDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.effectiveDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_type in (2020,2021,2030) and p10_casee.`status` = 1 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.effectiveDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "cpjgsx" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_casee.casee_detail, "$.effectiveDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 8 as reminderType,p10_assets.assets_name as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_assets_re.assets_re_id as businessId,p10_assets_re.subject_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_assets_re left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null and p10_assets.type = 20200 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "stcccfdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 9 as reminderType,p10_assets.assets_name as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_assets_re.assets_re_id as businessId,p10_assets_re.subject_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsFreeze.freezeExpirationDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsFreeze.freezeExpirationDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_assets_re left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null and p10_assets.type = 20100 and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsFreeze.freezeExpirationDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "zjccdjdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, "$.assetsFreeze.freezeExpirationDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 10 as reminderType,p10_assets.assets_name as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_assets_re.assets_re_id as businessId,p10_assets_re.subject_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionStartDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionStartDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_assets_re left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_target on p10_target.goal_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_assets_re.casee_id = p10_target.casee_id left join p10_task_node on p10_task_node.target_id = p10_target.target_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null and p10_assets.type = 20200 and p10_target.goal_type = 20001 and p10_task_node.node_attributes = 400 and p10_task_node.node_key = "entityZX_STZX_CCZXPMGG_CCZXPMGG" and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionStartDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "ggqdq" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionStartDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION
select 11 as reminderType,p10_assets.assets_name as businessName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_casee.casee_id,p10_casee.casee_number,p10_assets_re.assets_re_id as businessId,p10_assets_re.subject_name as executedName,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionEndDate"),2,10) as expireDate,timestampdiff(day,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionEndDate"),2,10)) as remainingDays from p10_assets_re left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_target on p10_target.goal_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_assets_re.casee_id = p10_target.casee_id and p10_project.project_id = p10_target.project_id left join p10_task_node on p10_task_node.target_id = p10_target.target_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.project_type = 100 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null and p10_assets.type = 20200 and p10_target.goal_type = 20001 and p10_task_node.node_attributes = 400 and p10_task_node.node_key = "entityZX_STZX_CCZXPMGG_CCZXPMGG" and DATE_SUB(substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionEndDate"),2,10), INTERVAL (select reminder_days from p10_deadline_configure WHERE del_flag = 0 and period_configure_key = "pmjs" limit 1) day) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionEndDate"),2,10) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') )statisticsReminder
and statisticsReminder.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and statisticsReminder.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and statisticsReminder.company_code like concat('%', #{query.companyCode}, '%')
and statisticsReminder.executedName like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
AND statisticsReminder.expireDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
ORDER BY statisticsReminder.expireDate asc
